claim: Coldsnap does not include any black-bordered cards; all its printings used a white border.
extra_info: card set Coldsnap refers to name = 'Coldsnap'; black border color refers to borderColor = 'black'
reasoning: The database shows that all 155 cards in the Coldsnap set (code CSP) have borderColor = 'black'. The claim asserts Coldsnap has no black-bordered cards and only white-bordered ones, which is the exact opposite of what the data shows.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "sets"
(
    id               INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    baseSetSize      INTEGER,
    block            TEXT,
    booster          TEXT,
    code             TEXT              not null
        unique,
    isFoilOnly       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isForeignOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isNonFoilOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly     INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPartialPreview INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keyruneCode      TEXT,
    mcmId            INTEGER,
    mcmIdExtras      INTEGER,
    mcmName          TEXT,
    mtgoCode         TEXT,
    name             TEXT,
    parentCode       TEXT,
    releaseDate      DATE,
    tcgplayerGroupId INTEGER,
    totalSetSize     INTEGER,
    type             TEXT
);

content.text: Now let me check the Coldsnap set and its cards' border colors.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT code, name FROM sets WHERE name = 'Coldsnap';"
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT borderColor, COUNT(*) FROM cards WHERE setCode IN (SELECT code FROM sets WHERE name = 'Coldsnap') GROUP BY borderColor;"
input.description: Check border colors for Coldsnap cards

content.text:
The data is clear. The Coldsnap set (code: CSP) has **155 cards**, and **all of them** have `borderColor = 'black'`.

The claim states that "Coldsnap does not include any black-bordered cards; all its printings used a white border." This is directly contradicted by the data, which shows every single card in Coldsnap has a black border, not a white border.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The database shows that all 155 cards in the Coldsnap set (code CSP) have borderColor = 'black'. The claim asserts Coldsnap has no black-bordered cards and only white-bordered ones, which is the exact opposite of what the data shows."}
```
